title: New: Sleep ∞ Over – Romantic Streams (CFCF remix)
body: Montreal’s [CFCF](http://soundcloud.com/cfcf) reworking of last years wonder track, **_[Romantic Streams](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9421-new-mpfree-sleep-%e2%88%9e-over-romantic-streams/ "New & MPfree: Sleep ∞ Over – Romantic Streams")_**, has made me re-visit one of my favorite albums of last year, so it can only be a good thing. It also happens to be a fantastic, hollowed out, yet flush and reverberating reinterpretation of the ‘classic’.

excerpt.full: Montreal’s CFCF reworking of last years wonder track, Romantic Streams, has made me re-visit one of my favorite albums of last year, so it can only be a good thing. It also happens to be a fantastic, hollowed out, yet flush and reverberating reinterpretation of the ‘classic’.
